name: Dizzying Heights
description:
Dizzying Heights
by Shiny Side Games

Shiny Side Games is:
Elliot McMillan (elliotmcmillan9@gmail.com) - Engineering and Design
Brandon Miracle (rbrandonmiracle@gmail.com) - Art and Design
Victor Guzman (guzmanvic85@gmail.com) - Characters and Animation

Dizzy Rabbit is on a quest to collect all the gold stars she can find. Jump from landing pad to landing pad to navigate through each level. But be careful, certain surfaces will disappear after you land on them, turning up the difficulty quickly.

Packaged for Windows.
